sentences.sCn: 他沿高速公路高速行驶。

sentences.sContent: Then he swung the car onto the expressway.
sentences.sContent_eng: Then he swung the car onto the expressway.
sentences.sCn: 然后他便转弯把车驶入了高速公路。

sentences.sContent: The car collision succeeded on the expressway due to a dense fog.
sentences.sContent_eng: The car collision succeeded on the expressway due to a dense fog.
sentences.sCn: 因为浓雾，在高速公路上发生了连续撞车事件。

trans.tranOther: a wide road in a city on which cars can travel very quickly without stopping
